sentences.en: As I recall, it was you who suggested this idea in the first place.
sentences.cn: 我记得，是你首先提出这个想法的。

sentences.en: Becky could still recall that first meeting clearly.
sentences.cn: 贝姬还能清晰地记起初次见面的情景.

sentences.en: Cole was recalled to the squad to replace the injured Quinn.
sentences.cn: 科尔被召回队里代替受伤的奎因。

sentences.en: He has complete recall and never forgets anything.
sentences.cn: 他有很好的记忆力,从不忘记任何事.

sentences.en: He seemed to have a very selective recall of past events.
sentences.cn: 他好像对过去的事情有选择地回忆.

sentences.en: I can't recall where he lives.
sentences.cn: 我想不起他住在哪儿.

sentences.en: I don't recall where I met him.
sentences.cn: 我记不起在哪儿见到他的了.

sentences.en: I don't recall where to meet her.
sentences.cn: 我不能记起在哪儿见过她.

sentences.en: I know his face but I can't recall his name.
sentences.cn: 看他面熟,名字可叫不上来.

sentences.en: It would be great to get a recall to the England squad for Sweden.
sentences.cn: 若能够被召进英格兰队参加对瑞典的比赛那就太棒了。

sentences.en: It's gone beyond recall.
sentences.cn: 这已经不能撤销了.

sentences.en: Let me recall what he said.
sentences.cn: 让我回想一下他说过什么.

sentences.en: She could not recall his name.
sentences.cn: 她想不起他的名字。

sentences.en: shopping developments have already blighted other parts of the city beyond recall.
sentences.cn: 购物业的发展已经将这座城市的其他几个区给彻底破坏了。

sentences.en: The cars had to be recalled due to an engine fault.
sentences.cn: 由于发动机缺陷，那些汽车必须召回。

sentences.en: The ground has been polluted beyond recall.
sentences.cn: 这片土地已被污染得面目全非。

sentences.en: The old-timers used to recall how hot 1886 was.
sentences.cn: 老人们常常回想起1886年的酷热。

sentences.en: They recall the good buddies they used to have in middle school.
sentences.cn: 他们想起了过去上中学时的好伙伴。

sentences.en: We demand that you recall your army from our border.
sentences.cn: 我们要求你们撤回在我们边境的部队.

sentences.en: You don’t happen to recall his name, do you?
sentences.cn: 你不会恰巧还想得起他的名字吧？

phrases.tran_cn: 不能被记起的；召唤不回来的，不能挽回的；不可取消的

trans.tran_en: an official order telling someone to return to a place, especially before they expected to

trans.tran_cn: 召回（残损货品等），回想起，使想到，罢免
trans.tran_en: to remember a particular fact, event, or situation from the past
to remember a particular fact, event, or situation from the past

trans.tran_cn: 回忆；召回，叫回；回收；收回
trans.tran_en: to remember a particular fact, event, or situation from the past
to remember a particular fact, event, or situation from the past
